title: $2500 two bedrooms, 1400, 47 Avenue, Apt. 5, SF CA 94122
posting_body: 1400, 47 avenue, Apt.5, San Francisco, CA 94122, at corner of Judah street
Nice neighborhood near Ocean Beach, Great Highway, Golden Gate Bridge, beautiful sunset view and outdoor activities
August 6, 7,13, 14, each day 12 noon to 2 p.m.
2 bright bedrooms with windows, walk -in closet, wood floor through out
Spacious living room, wood floor, big windows with sunset warmth and view
Huge eat-in kitchen, electric stove, refrigerator, granite counter top, lot of cabinets
Bathroom with shower over bath tub, tile floor
Near transportation, N Judah street car to UCSF, SF City College, Downtown, Bart, Ferry, South of Market, Mission Bay, General Hospital, Kaiser Hospital
bus #18 on 46 Avenue to SF State U, City College, Stonestown Galleria, Trader's Joe, Safeway
Bus # 29 on Sunset Blvd.,  SF State U, City College, Richmond District
Close to restaurants, cafe', coffee shop, laundry, stores, 7 Eleven,
Rent $2500 per month, no last month rent, one year lease
Tenant pays all utilities, separate PGE, garbage, share water, gas bill
No pet, No dog, No cat, No smoking
